J. Scheuchzers</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Vernunfft-m√§√üige Undersuchung des Baades zu Baaden, mit Kupfferen</TITLE>, <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT> <YEAR>1732.</YEAR> √† <PRIZE>11.√ü.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>J. parsed.explanation: Fixed 4 structural issues: 1) Removed nested BIBL tags within the second entry - flattened "Monita", "De Magnirudine Romana", and "De Constantia" as separate TITLE elements within the same BIBL. 2) Removed nested BIBL tag for "de Amphitheatris extra Romam" - made it a separate TITLE within the same BIBL as "de Amphitheatro". 3) Changed one instance of PRICE tag to PRIZE to maintain consistency. 4) Left the Unicode characters as-is since they represent historical German typography (√ for ss, √ü for ü, √§ for ä, √† for †) which should be preserved for historical accuracy.
